c major.gloss: (music) the major scale having no sharps or flats

c major scale.gloss: (music) the major scale having no sharps or flats

cm.gloss: a metric unit of length equal to one hundredth of a meter

cmb.gloss: (cosmology) the cooled remnant of the hot big bang that fills the entire universe and can be observed today with an average temperature of about 2.725 kelvin

cmbr.gloss: (cosmology) the cooled remnant of the hot big bang that fills the entire universe and can be observed today with an average temperature of about 2.725 kelvin

cmv.gloss: any of a group of herpes viruses that enlarge epithelial cells and can cause birth defects
